title: It’s A Snow Day: Open? Closed? Who Knows! [#ArcticBlast2011]
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded:
It’s a snow day for many Nashville businesses today, but not everyone has packed up and gone home to play. To help minimize snowpocalypse frustration, we’re keeping this running list of businesses that are open, closed, or keeping different hours today (and possibly tomorrow). Help us stay updated with any additions or corrections by letting us know in the comments or on Twitter!
